title: Poltergeist Trilogy 1982 1986 1988 Bluray 720p AVC AC3 Dual ACS
description:
Poltergeist - The Phenomenon 
Steven and Diane Freeling, a young couple from California, along with Dana, Robbie and little CarolAnne children represent the typical American family north of the eighties. It all starts with the girl talking to the TV and furniture that move alone, until one night, during a storm, Carol Anne disappears inside her bedroom closet. By chance, on a TV channel with no signal, the family can hear your voice and to communicate with the girl. The Freeling seeking a team of parapsychologists and a powerful medium to bring Carol Anne back, even having to face an unknown world, angry spirits and demonic manifestations within the home, hiding a terrible secret. 

Poltergeist 2 - The Other Side 
The Freeling family moves in an attempt to recover from the trauma caused by the abduction of Carol Anne (Heather O'Rourke) by the Beast. However, it will not be discarded so easily. Thus, the Beast reappears as the Reverend Kane (Julian Beck), a religious who was responsible for the death of many of his followers. The goal is to have the Beast Carol Anne, but this needs to be stronger than the love of her family, who joined a psychic that had helped in the past and a wise Indian. 

poltergeist III 
A therapist tries to heal Carol Anne (Heather O'Rourke) the traumas left by their terrifying experiences. However, to rummage in their memories, the forces of evil in return skin Reverend Kane to threaten her again.
